proposal.title: Pilot Implementation of Secure LLM Analytics Dashboard with Training Program
proposal.description: Develop a secure, maintainable MVP dashboard for LLM usage analytics with comprehensive training and support infrastructure.

dao_info.name: Research DAO
dao_info.description: A decentralized organization focused on advancing blockchain technology through funded research initiatives
dao_info.objective: To advance the field of blockchain technology by funding and coordinating innovative research projects and academic collaborations
dao_info.values:
1. Scientific Rigor
2. Open Source Collaboration
3. Academic Excellence
4. Innovation Focus
5. Research Reproducibility

prompts: Assess security measures and implementation risks
Evaluate budget allocation and resource planning
Review data privacy and security compliance
Assess governance alignment and regulatory requirements
